title: Underworld Azir

embed.description: League of Legends skin concepts for all champions, along with information on upcoming League of Legends skins.

body: I found the skin i Did not make it however I quite enjoy Azir and this would be pretty much an insta buy.

replies.body: Soulstealer Azir would seem more appropriate, it looks like it would sit next to the Soulstealer Vladimir splash art very well.
Yeah soul stealer sounds better, the reason i went with underworld is because that's the name the creator gave it.

> [{quoted}](name=crasherX8,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AoT1zzxb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-01T17:43:40.442+0000)
>
> Soulstealer Azir would seem more appropriate, it looks like it would sit next to the Soulstealer Vladimir splash art very well.

Definately. Azir needs a better skin. Galactic is just....blegh.{{champion:268}} {{item:3070}}
To be honest i thought of a Risen Azir with zombies solders seems like an easy one
fans' concepts were a lot beter
This reminds me of the world that Hermaeus Mora lives in from the Dragonborn DLC in skyrim.

that is amazing i would probably buy this skin for 1820 rp to if they changed a lot more things like the voice and couple other stuff instead of it being his normal voice wouldn't really follow the look and his dances and taunts wouldn't either

1 and OMG RIOT PLEASE this splash just looks amazing (probably because i love all mythology especially Egyptian) but please riot make this a skin especially since azir is a top pick for us golds and a top ban/pick in lcs so please make this a skin for Halloween or something

I think its actually rather likely that we get such a skin this year.

Also I'd say he should wear a pest doctor mask
